articles.title: 'Time stopped' after Alex Salmond collapsed at conference

articles.title: Male domestic abuse victim stopped from using bathroom and toilet

articles.title: UN says Israeli tanks forced entry to its position in south Lebanon as Netanyahu tells peacekeepers to leave

articles.description: The boss of the UK's biggest lender says mortgage costs are unlikely to fall to levels seen in the past decade.
articles.title: Mortgage rates unlikely to return to low levels, says Lloyds boss

articles.description: Bands and singers play half as many gigs on an average tour as they did in the 1990s, figures suggest.

articles.description: A new study shines light on a hotly contested centuries-old mystery.
articles.title: Christopher Columbus was likely Spanish and Jewish, study suggests

articles.description: He wants to make residents smile and laugh against the city's "overregulation and lack of fun".
